name: Duchy of Arepandia
startIntroPart1:
Buenas sumercé! Great leader of the independent duchy, your multiple public proyects that you started brought prosperity to the nation, when they were finished, that is...
But the will of the people makes the nation move foward and keep up with the strongest of oponents.
startIntroPart2:
We'll defend from the attack
Altough our nation may be halved
We'll resist the whack
'Til Triumph you shall have.
introduction: Buenas sumercé, how are ya? Wanna a tad bit of coffee?
declaringWar: *Alright God, please not another Stalingrad battle*
afterPeace:
So uncivilized...
oh wait... that's da name of the game...
uniques: [+1 Food] from all [Gold] buildings
[+1 Gold] from all [Culture] buildings

name: Hankunesia
startIntroPart1: Ace Hank of Hankunesia, you lead your people towards great cultural achievment. Your people begged you to settle more cities now it's getting crowdy, but your laziness to micromanage your cities hinders your empire in this meta.
startIntroPart2: O, Ace Hank, you will lead your kingdom for another turn. Will you start settling more cities? Will you micromanage your empire? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of one more turn?
declaringWar: Finally! A Worthy Opponent! Our Battle Will Be Legendary!
defeated: Aduh hiyung... I think I'm dead.
introduction: Sugeng rawuh stranger, please sit and make yourself at home. And please take of your shoes.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with Hankunesia?
uniqueText: +1 Great Artist Point from [Culture] buildings in your first 4 cities
uniques: Provides a [Pusat Kebudayaan] in your first [4] cities for free
Gain a free [Monument Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Monument]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>
Gain a free [Amphitheater Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Amphitheater]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>
Gain a free [Opera House Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Opera House]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>
Gain a free [Museum Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Museum]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>
Gain a free [Broadcast Tower Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Broadcast Tower]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>
Gain a free [Keraton Artist] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Keraton]> <in cities with a [Pusat Kebudayaan]>

name: Lasty's Kazakhstan
startIntroPart1: Assalam Aleykum Lasty Стратег, Sultan of Kazakhstan. Your reign has led to the golden age of your empire, and your peacefulness would be the envy of the whole world! You were a just ruler, and always made decisions that changed everything for the better!
startIntroPart2: Despite the threats around you, your people believe in you and will support you.
introduction: Assalam Aleykum my friend, I am Sultan of Kazakhstan. Who are you?
declaringWar: Your aggression has no end, I'm forced to take action.
defeated: How many nations will look at you with contempt.
tradeRequest: What is your opinion about it?
uniqueText:
Free Mounted unit appears upon constructing Stable,
Gain 20 Influence with a Mounted unit gift to a City-State
uniques: Free [Chariot Archer] appears <upon constructing [Stable]> <after discovering [The Wheel]> <before discovering [Horseback Riding]>
Gain [20] Influence with a [Chariot Archer] gift to a City-State
Free [Horseman] appears <upon constructing [Stable]> <after discovering [Horseback Riding]> <before discovering [Chivalry]>
Gain [20] Influence with a [Horseman] gift to a City-State
Free [Knight] appears <upon constructing [Stable]> <after discovering [Chivalry]> <before discovering [Metallurgy]>
Gain [20] Influence with a [Knight] gift to a City-State
Free [Kazakh Nomad] appears <upon constructing [Stable]> <after discovering [Metallurgy]> <before discovering [Military Science]>
Gain [20] Influence with a [Kazakh Nomad] gift to a City-State
Free [Cavalry] appears <upon constructing [Stable]> <after discovering [Military Science]>
Gain [20] Influence with a [Cavalry] gift to a City-State

name: Wonderland
introduction: Hello my friend, did you come to see this Wonderful land?
attacked: You can't break this marvelous walls.
defeated: Archibald you may hace one this time but in our next live you shall fall.
uniques: May choose [1] additional [Founder] beliefs when [founding] a religion
May choose [1] additional [Enhancer] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion

name: Bamboo Kingdom
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Scientist]
[+1 Gold, +1 Production] from [Jungle] tiles without [Trading post] [in all cities]

name: Penguinesia
introduction: Welcome stranger, I am Emperor Penguin of the beautiful and civilized nation of Penguinesia.
tradeRequest: I've got a deal for you:
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [33]% less than normal

name: The Imperium of Fire
favoredReligion: The Church of the Daring Flame
startIntroPart1: The flame of ambition is fueled by those daring few
startIntroPart2: will you dare to rule the world?
declaringWar: The Imperium deems you weak and frail. You must be extinguished
attacked: If you dare stick your hand in the fire, don't be surprised to come out burned
afterPeace:
So uncivilized...
oh wait... that's da name of the game...
defeated: The Imperiums ambitions were too daring, now our flame has been extinguished...
hateHello: Are you here to pay tribute?
tradeRequest: This trade is beneficial to both of us
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Desert] tiles [in all cities] <in tiles without [Flood plains]> <in tiles without [Oasis]>

name: Aleksandria
declaringWar:
The deeds sing, goddess, of the Motherland's son, A1y0sh4,
that war enterprises which brought countless glories upon the Comrades,
and sent forth to Hades many valiant enemies.
attacked:
Finally someone ambitious enough to try to win me over.
May you succeed or die under my triumph.
defeated:
I know nothing about what I ignore, there's not much that I can do about it,
and yet my latest realization burns my soul almost as much, in pride, I have burnt till now.
introduction:
Zdravstvuyte! I am A1y0sh4, great emperor of our glorious Motherland,
but you can call me Alyosha.
hateHello:
Are you still in this side of the Acheron?
What do you want?
tradeRequest:
Some believe that trade is the engine of the world.
Would you like to move it in this direction?
uniques: [+1 Science] from every [Mine] <in [Tundra] tiles>
[+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <in [Tundra] tiles>

name: Ketonia
startIntroPart1: Raise the Swords for Lady Ferii, the great General of Ketonia! Oh great General, Your Network of colonies supply your country with luxurys and Resources, and strategical inventions like the field gun support you on the Battlefield.
startIntroPart2: Now its time to rebuild this civilisation from its ancient roots. Will you create a world-spanning trade network? Will you rule the Battlefield? Can you build a Civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Its time to speak on the same level: The rolling thunder of the battlefield!
attacked: We may seem weak to you, but we will see who is first to flee when the battle begins!
defeated: You may have broken the lines of the ketonian Army at last, and even if I'm never going to see it, you will pay for this one day!
introducrion: Welcome to the glory of Ketonia!
neutralLetsHearIt: What can I do for you?
neutralYes: That seems like a good deal for both of us.
neutralNo: Sorry, but I have to refuse.
This doesn't look like a good option to me.
hateHello: I hope you have thought before coming here!
hateNo: Have you come here for joking?
hateYes: At least some of your ideas are worth of thinking.
tradeRequest: I hope we both can profit from this deal.
afterPiece: Do you fear the power of the ketonian arms?
uniques: [+2 Happiness][in puppeted cities]
[+10]% [Gold][in puppeted cities]
[+25]% [Gold] from Trade Routes
[+1 Science] from each Trade Route

name: The Reactors
startIntroPart1: Where are the laptops, my fellow Reactor? Is this the past?... I hate you guys.
startIntroPart2: That Reactor has broken his time machine and he is stuck in the past. What should he do now?
attacked: Dude, what the canolli are you doing?
defeated: This is the Reactors, we're now signing off.
introduction: We are the Reactors, the sons and daughters of the internet.
hateHello: The Reactors will not tolerate any of your questionable actions.
uniqueName: Generations React to Building a Civilization
uniques: [+1 Culture] [in all cities]

name: Thuntopia
startIntroPart1: Thunder Crims of Thuntopia, a war-focused nation that will truly conquer the world with an iron fist that will shoot down any attempts at destruction of this nation. Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
attacked: I don't believe this is in your favor.
defeated: I don't think I'm getting out of this one...
tradeRequest: I think you'll like this deal.
uniques: [+33]% [Production] [in all cities] <for [10] turns> <upon declaring war with a major Civilization>

name: San Andor
startIntroPart1: Salute you commander!after some little tactical mistake you have lost more than 98% of your nation land area,now you're left with the capital city ,San Andor, you then decided to make the last decision before its too late
startIntroPart2: O, great general will you bring back the land which is rightfully belong to you?,can you build a Civilization that will stand the test of time
declaringWar: I have wait for this moment for a long time!
attacked: This will be the last struggle for me and you!
introduction: Hello my friend do you know the ground you're standing on used to be mine?
tradeRequest: After a while of consideration i have come up with this deal.
uniques: [+50]% Strength <for [Non-City] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
[-20]% Strength <for [Non-City] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
[+4 Production] [in capital]
Cannot build [Settler] units
